1.0.2.en: Fix a bug where the app report no data on extract air. Also add exhaust air data.

1.0.3.en: Adding more logging to detect why devices may not initiate.

1.0.5.en: No user-facing changes. Only code dependency updates.

1.0.6.en: No user-facing changes. Only optimising build size.

1.0.7.en: Updated app metadata and app images.

1.0.8.en: No user-facing changes. Internal BACnet simulator and reliability improvements.

1.1.0.en: Added filter maintenance support: you can now reset the filter timer after replacing filters under the device maintenance section, and you can set the filter change interval under the device advanced settings.

1.2.0.en: Added separate Home and Away target temperature settings in Advanced Settings, and the main target temperature now follows the active mode automatically. Added per-mode fan profile settings (Home/Away/High/Fireplace/Cooker), current supply and extract fan setpoint readouts, and new Flow cards to set a fan profile for a selected mode or trigger when supply/extract fan setpoints change. Improved mode handling so fan mode and active setpoints stay consistent.

1.3.0.en: Add support for controlling electrical heating through flows.

1.3.1.en: Add missing capability icons and refresh the driver icon.
